cast.name: 埃斯特班·雷卡尼奥 Esteban Recagno

introduction: Javi Fuentes es el anfitrión de talk show más famoso del país y se gana la vida burlándose de los demás. Cuando su padre fallece, Javi pierde su sentido del humor y es reemplazado por un insoportable influencer. Para recuperar su programa, Javi decide contratar a una alcohólica rehabilitada que intentará enseñarle a reírse de sí mismo antes que de los demás.Javi Fuentes is the host of the most popular talk show of the country and makes a living by making fun of everybody. After his father’s death, he loses his sense of humor and with this, his job. In order to get it back, he hires an alcoholic stand-up comedian, who will try to teach him to make fun of himself and his own tragedies.
